caption.p: Group 5: Anthropogenic spherules. ( a– d) SEM images of anthropogenic spherules found only in surface sediments at Pilauco. They are morphologically similar to Group 1 impact-related spherules, but SEM-EDS analyses show that these spherules are geochemically dissimilar to all other groups at Pilauco. Ternary diagram in Fig. 7a demonstrates geochemical similarity of them to known anthropogenic spherules.
